column4: is anyone aware of some kind of program that watches port  22 and blocks the IP of anyone with 3 bad login attempts within 60 secs, or some such ?
it may be possible to do something like this with iptables rules or with pam rules
i know that its possible to use iptables rules to limit login tries for port 22
